mapper.insert:
select comment_SEQ.nextval as id from dual
INSERT INTO commentInfo(id,parentId,type,commentator,gmtCreate,gmtModify,likeCount,content) VALUES (#{id},#{parentId},#{type},#{commentator},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModify},#{likeCount},#{content})
mapper.select: select * from commentinfo where parentid = #{id} order by gmtcreate desc
